messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for the Monthly IMO Package.
What does the Monthly IMO Package include?
Can you tell me about the Monthly IMO offer?
What are the benefits of the Monthly IMO package?

The Monthly IMO Package offers 500MB of internet specifically for use on IMO for Rs. 50, including taxes. This package is valid for 30 days and allows you to message and video chat extensively with family and friends.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on how to subscribe to the Monthly IMO Package.
How can I subscribe to the Monthly IMO Package?
What's the code to activate the Monthly IMO offer?
Tell me how to get the Monthly IMO package.
You can subscribe to the Monthly IMO Package by dialing *466# from your Telenor GSM Prepaid SIM.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing details on package renewals.
Does the Monthly IMO Package renew automatically?
Will my Monthly IMO automatically renew?
The Monthly IMO Package does not renew automatically. You must manually subscribe again once it expires to continue using the services.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package eligibility.
Who is eligible for the Monthly IMO Package?
Can anyone subscribe to the Monthly IMO offer?
All Telenor GSM Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly IMO Package.

The Monthly Snapchat Package offers 2000MB of internet specifically for Snapchat usage for Rs. 5, valid for 30 days. This allows you to maintain streaks and stay connected with friends on Snapchat all month long.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on how to subscribe to the Monthly Snapchat Package.

You can subscribe to the Monthly Snapchat Package by dialing *915# from your Telenor GSM Prepaid SIM.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing details on package renewals.
Does the Monthly Snapchat Package renew automatically?
Will my Monthly Snapchat automatically renew?
The Monthly Snapchat Package does not renew automatically. You must manually subscribe again once it expires to continue using the services.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package restrictions.
Can I resubscribe to the Monthly Snapchat Package before it expires?
Is it possible to renew the Monthly Snapchat Package before the 30 days are up?
Resubscription to the Monthly Snapchat Package within its validity period is not allowed. You can only subscribe again once the current subscription expires.
